sentences.english: Temple sitting West headed east, on both sides of the gate-two stone lions and two Shek Kwu.
sentences.chinese: 寺坐西朝東，山門兩側各放兩隻石獅子和兩隻石鼓。

sentences.english: Large Seal Script of the artworks, generally considered to be "Ancient Proses on Stones."
sentences.chinese: 大篆的真跡，一般認爲是“石鼓文”。

sentences.english: Ancient Proses on Stones with Qiu Jin dignified style.
sentences.chinese: 石鼓文具有遒勁凝重的風格。

sentences.english: The Stone Drum Academy is one of the four famous academies.
sentences.chinese: 石鼓書院是中國歷史上盛名天下的“四大書院”之一。
